list_definition.definition: to make, become, or be, angled or curved

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I can’t bend my arm properly
She bent down to pick up the coin
The road bends to the right
He could bend an iron bar.

list_definition.definition: to force (someone) to do what one wants

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He bent me to his will.
